effect.x-y: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.x-y: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
